Posts.Content: On 9/29/2006 Oncrx wrote: most lumps are not cancer. However ,you should get it checked out by a doctor. A mammogram may not be necessary at all. You mentioned you dont want to see a doc, but thats the place to start. Why no health insurance? Are you self employed? Good luck and dont give up !  I went to the er. after finding a lump in my right breast  the doc there wanted me to get a mammorgram but i don't have a health care plan so i can't get any help getting it i have a 13yr old and i don't want to leave him behind because of it where could i go for help , i'm having pain in it to the point of having to sleep in a recliner
Posts.Title: Can't Seem to Get Help Getting a Mammogram
